values:
I did my French GCSE earlier in the year (Americans on my flist: a GCSE is an important exam everyone takes at 16, but you can do them earlier/later if you want. I did my French a year early). I've just got my results, and......I got an A! I have no idea how, but I did it!

*BOUNCE BOUNCE BOUNCE*

I probably won't be updating here anymore, now that I have my GJs. But I will be posting/commenting in my communities and commenting in my friends' journals. Love you guys! *hugs*

 

PS just heard on the news that Dick Cheney privately opposes Bush's proposed ban on gay marriage (his daughter is a lesbian). Hoorah. So it would seem that not all of Bush's cronies are bigoted idiots. Shame the actual President is.

Gay Pride!

1

Right, here's some things about both the next Harry Potter books that I found out whilst trawling the Internet....though please note some are only rumours, and others are still subject to change. If anyone has additional information, please let me know!

Harry Potter 6

  1. JK Rowling is currently at least halfway through book six.
  2. It's confirmed title is 'Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince'. The half-blood prince in question is neither Harry or Voldemort, and presumably a new character....though it could be another half-blood already known or even a half-breed (doubtful).
  3. Romulus Lupin (Remus' brother) will make an appearance (love the name!)
  4. Panicking about Voldemort's return, the Ministry of Magic will declare war against all Dark Creatures, including werewolves, and Remus has to go into hiding to save his life.
  5. Due to Sirius' death and the fact that Remus is the only Marauder left, Remus becomes more of a father-figure to Harry.
  6. Harry's time spent with the Dursleys' becomes even shorter - but obviously, he still has to spend some time there.
  7. Pride will cause Harry's downfall in book 6.

Harry Potter 7

  1. Harry is seventeen years old and in his last year at Hogwarts. Book 7 will also see Harry come of age and face his destiny.
  2. It will contain a big climax (well, obviously).
  3. We will find out why certain people will become ghosts after death.
  4. We will find out what happens to the survivors in the final chapter.
  5. Remus will play a major role in book 7.
  6. The last word of the book will be 'scar'.*
  7. Hermione will be made Head Girl (not really very surprising!).
  8. One of the three friends (Harry, Ron, Hermione) will have died by the end of the book - JKR herself has confirmed this. A lot of people are saying Ron....could he die trying to save Harry/Hermione from something?
  9. Book 7 will be the biggest of all seven books, because - as JKR said herself - she will have trouble saying goodbye to Harry.

Rumours about HP 7

  1. Harry and Draco will join forces.
  2. After graduation Neville will get a teaching position at Hogwarts.
  3. Draco will be made Head Boy.
  4. Rumoured titles: Harry Potter and The Forest/Fortress of Shadows.
  5. Harry will turn evil.

*I have so far heard two different versions of what could be the last sentence of HP7. Obviously, JKR does not want to spoil the end for her readers, so she won't say what it is. But as we know, the Prophecy in book 5 says that either Harry or Voldemort must kill the other - so presumably book 7 ends with either event.

Ending Number 1:

'and in a moment of silence let us remember Harry Potter...the boy with the lightning bolt scar..'
(we obviously don't know who says it....it doesn't sound much like Dumbledore to me, though.)

Ending Number 2:

'Harry....where's your scar?'

(this indicates that Harry's scar has gone and therefore he is Voldemort's replacement)

Again any comformation/different rumours or theories about the books would be very much appreciated!

Thanks to www.remus-lupin.net - you guys rule!
And I shall celebrate by losing everything I own.

I am currently sitting at the computer in my favourite woolly jumper (pale blue marl) drinking hot chocolate. And I have just finished reading PoA for, like, the millionth time. Je suis un fangirl du Remus totale. Oui.

http://www.livejournal.com/community/1moon1star/17394.html?

Remus is a walking sex god. 'Tis official.

Especially for , because she needs some cheering up right now. Faith sweetie, I would seriously advise you to join this community, 'tis wonderful! Doggy-love galore!

Yeah, I've just got back from holiday. It was very nice indeed, thanks. There was a shop called Sirius in Abergavenny! But I didn't go in :(. BUT, best of all, there is a place called Crickhowell (it's almost Crickhollow!) and and andandand a place called BUCKLAND. Yeah. It had a big town hall-type place, and I thought to my self, if I asked for the Master of Buckland, would they think I'm crazy? Hee :). And Jen, what's this I hear about Lost coming to Channel 4?? O. M. G. *hearts Channel 4* *sigh* I've missed you all, my preciousessses. I'm so glad to be back! PS Jen, did you get the issue of Total Film magazine with Keira on t'front? *dissolves*

Take the Dante's Divine Comedy Inferno Test Bwahahahahahahahahahahaha!!!! PoA Puppet Movie Theatre Very good, as always. Oh, and one more thing: 12 REASONS TO BAN GAY MARRIAGE 1. Homosexuality is not natural, much like eyeglasses, polyester, and birth control. 2. Heterosexual marriages are valid because they produce children. Infertile couples and old people can't legally get married because the world needs more children. 3. Obviously gay parents will raise gay children, since straight parents only raise straight children. 4. Straight marriage will be less meaningful, since Britney Spears' 55-hour just-for-fun marriage was meaningful. 5. Heterosexual marriage has been around a long time and hasn't changed at all; just like women are property, blacks can't marry whites, and divorce is illegal. 6. Gay marriage should be decided by people not the courts, because the majority-elected legislatures, not courts, have historically protected the rights of the minorities. 7. Gay marriage is not supported by religion. In a theocracy like ours, the values of one religion are imposed on the entire country. That's why we have only one religion in America. 8. Gay marriage will encourage people to be gay, in the same way that hanging around tall people will make you tall. 9. Legalising gay marriage will open the door to all kinds of crazy behavior. People may even wish to marry their pets because a dog has legal standing and can sign a marriage contract. 10. Children can never suceed without a male and a female role model at home. That's why single parents are forbidden to raise children. 11. Gay marriage will change the foundation of society. Heterosexual marriage has been around for a long time, and we could never adapt to new social norms because we haven't adapted to cars or longer lifespans. 12. Civil unions, providing most of the same benefits as marriage with a different name, are better because a "separate but equal" institution is always constitutional. Separate schools for African-Americans worked just as well as separate marriages for gays and lesbians will. Fabulous. My favourites are 2,3,8 and 9 :).
Potter Puppet Pals So, so funny. 'Trouble at Hogwarts' is my own favourite. Enjoy!

You have to check this out: Severus Snape's Personals ad I can't tell you how much that made me laugh and made me want to post a reply to the ad... Seriously though, is it weird to have what is appearing to be a crush on Snape?!?!? And is it weird to really, really like this ficlet?? More Snapey goodness tomorrow, kids. Stay evil!

Sorry I haven't updated in ages! I've been both busy and with limited internet access, which hasn't helped. I'm going to do what I've wanted to do for ages....do picspam! DOM *Sigh* Y'know, even with long hair and a beard, the man is still utterly gorgeous. How does he do it?? KEIRA Man, she is so beautiful. KATE DILLON Proving once and for all that curvy, voluptuous women RULE. No question. Pics like this really make me feel happier with my body, 'cos I know that having hips and a big bottom, and (even though I do say it myself) a magnificent bosom can only be a good thing. And the more women that start accepting that, the better. So, picspam attack over. Hope y'all enjoyed it ;).

Aaaah! I started reading Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone on Thursday, so almost a week ago. On Saturday, I started reading Chamber of Secrets. I haven't got Prisoner of Azkaban, so I went straight into Goblet of Fire (I have seen the movie of PoA!), I started that on Monday (I think). I am now on chapter 28, The Madness of Mr Crouch. So far, Hermione has been getting hate mail from Harry's fans and Harry has led Dumbledore to Mr Crouch because he was acting strangely (Mr Crouch, that is). I am officially a HP fangirl! OMG I don't know why I hadn't read them earlier, they are so brilliant! I hope they get a really good actor for Professer Moody, he's fabulous. Ian McKellen would be interesting. Kate Winslet is rumoured for the role of Fleur Delacour, but surely she's too old? Goblet of Fire is AMAZING. I can't wait to see all the Triwizard Championship stuff. Also tarted-up!Hermione! And the way Krum says her name! And the Veelas! And omg, the Quidditch World Cup! The guy in the kilt and the poncho (pleeeeeeeease let Billy play him!) and Archie, the guy in the flowery nightie (NORT). And Rita Skeeter is just genius. And yay, more Sirius! He so rocks. Here be some Hermione/Emma Watson picspam squeeage: *sigh* She is going to be so beautiful by the end of the last film (when she's 18). You can just tell.

Aaaah! I have a new journal! And I can't bloody well post in it. I can't get into my email from school, and I need to validate my address to post in my journal. Which is very annoying.

I'm a-thinking about setting up another journal for me to post all my women perving/squeeage/picspam and sex-type stuff, mainly so that if anyone on my flist is uncomfortable about that stuff, they can just read this journal. BUT I need your opinions, and whether you'd visit it (so I can have a separate flist for that), and...I need a name to start with! Any suggestions would be appreciated.
Has anyone got any good backgrounds? I would love some nice 1940s/50s-style pinup girls stuff or general perv-worthy girls stuff. Thanks!

Went to the Memorial Park today for geography coursework. Yesterday when the other group went, it was lovely sunny weather. Today it was raining. And bloody cold. 
The new geography teacher is really annoying, he looks sort of like Jonathon Ross, yet speaks like the Dead Ringers Greg Dyke. And he kept having a go at us for really little things. There was this little alcove-y building and a tramp was hiding in it, and on the way back he was asleep and everyone took photos of this old tramp asleep. Which was odd.
 And at lunch in the form, Jet came on the radio and the townies liked it. Which surprised me. 
 I don't feel that well. I'm really tired and my head aches and feels all woolly. But I don't think I have a temperature, so I prolly won't get to stay at home tomorrow.

BTW Jen, I don't think my mum'd mind if you phoned me tonight (only if you want to o' course), it's just when I stay on for two hours.

Okay, these are the five things that you really want right now. Mine are: (in no particular order) 1. To go and see Harry Potter ASAP. I have so much stuff to do in half term that I might not be able to do it then (I have 3 pieces of coursework, RE, History and Maths, and I have a language conference thing on Wednesday, Thursday and the Friday morning.). 2. A girlfriend. 3. A kitten. I want either a cream one to call Bella or a grey one to call Smeagol. Or a black one to call Salem, perhaps. I don't know, I just wanna kitty! 4. Some money... 5. Some new CDs. There are so many I want out right now, like I want Ash's Meltdown, and the new Glitterati one, and PJ Harvey's when it comes out. Now over to you!

Argh Jen, my evil school internet filter has blocked your LJ!
*kicks nearest kickable object*

Ohhh, I want a girlfriend so badly. I really do.

Eeeeee Jen I CANNOT WAIT!!!

I did my French GCSE oral today. It was at 9 am....:(. BUT Ms Neofitou (my teacher) said that I did really well, and at least I got it out of the way. I have my reading and speaking exams left, but they aren't a worry to me.

I spent half the day in Student Support today. It's because....well, everyone is just being so horrible and I can't cope. I get hurled abuse in the street by total strangers (usually adolescent boys, but I still hate it)and last night I started harming myself. Fortunately in my room there aren't any sisscors (sp?) or matches or anything, so I used the jagged metal edge on a sellotape dispenser. I couldn't draw blood, and there's not really a mark, but it's a bit red and sore. I'm kind of scared of myself now. I just feel so depressed and I'm not functioning properly. I'm really starting to fall behind with coursework. I'm seeing Kathy (the SS lady) tomorrow. I hope my teachers understand.

Well, I feel a bit better now, helped greatly by all my luvverly LJ friends. Wuv you schweedies, will try to pay you all back somehow...;) Anyway, I have decided that it would be better if I completely washed my hands of Becky, since it would seem that I really don't need people like her in my life. My other friends...I don't know. Emma is being okay, I suppose, but even she isn't as conversive (is that even a word?) as usual. The thing is, I don't want to end up completely friendless in the school, as that's what will happen if I let them go as well as Becky. And I can't help thinking that it's a bit sad that all my decent friends are online. What to do, what to do? :( Jen, cheer me up! The last method you used works just fine :p. 'Tis such a pity that you don't really live near Coventry, otherwise you could come over and we could have some fun. But Dom will do for now.

ARGH. My school is full of retards, fucktards and completely sad losers. My 'friend' Becky is acting more and more stupid by the minute - all because her seriously intellectually handicapped cousins/little year 9 friends are telling her that I have been telling them and others about how much I fancy Becky and how I shagged her at my sleepover. Um yeah, whatever. I don't find Becky even especially pretty, to be honest. And so she is being a) really weird, like she thinks I'm always trying to look up her skirt and b) trying to stop me from doing stuff with any of my other friends. And it's working. They're not being horrible, just indifferent and not...and not making conversation as they normally would. It's as if they don't want me around, but they never say that. And suddenly no-one is going into town on Saturdays....

   And Becky just won't even try to listen to me, and she is going completely over the top. Even if I DID fancy her, so what? And why did her evil, retarded little cousins tell her all that stuff, if it wasn't to cause trouble and be vindictive towards me cos their name-calling wasn't working? Of course, Becky the Fucktard thinks that they were being True Friends by telling her everything, of which almost all were complete lies, and the rest were half-truths twisted about so much you wouldn't recognise them. Sometimes I wonder why I even bother to be nice to people, they just screw you up  >:( .

   I  need a space cake.... : (

Yeah, back at school today. It wasn't TOO bad....but I'd still rather be sleeping. Oh, and I finished my book. It's called Daughter of Eve, and it's by Lynne Austin. It's brilliant. And I am so obsessed with changing my LJ's appearance!

You are Lollipop Dom! Flirty and meltingly provocative, you enjoy candy,
unbuttoned shirts, and teasing your poor female
(and male!) fans. Mmm, creamy.

Which Dominic Monaghan are you?
brought to you by Quizilla Lollipop Dom. Oh yesh. ;)

Nice day today. LOTS of stuff happened. Guy in Java Joes was looking at me smiling. Tried on v groovy clothes in Dorothy Perkins (I now have a secret love for there). And this.... Today, because of the proximity of Easter, there was a Christian group talking and singing etc, and it was done so eloquently I had to listen. So I asked one of the people for a leaflet, and we ended up having a good chat about Christianity and how I felt, and I said that I would like to get my faith back. So she prayed for me and...I prayed! I never thought in a million years that I would do that. And after, I felt this real sense of excitement and wanted to just jump about and go squee. It was like Jesus was saying, "Jade, you know I'm here, and I know you know I'm here, so just acknowledge me as, well, Christ." I feel so elated.....I just gotta go SQUEE! And yes, I am still queer....1 day at a time, I guess.
      
Marriage is love.
I will not stand for this

Feeling somewhat more perky today, y'know, with friends being wonderful as always and whatnot. Oh yes, and this page:

Calcium Kid trailer

Teehee....; )

Sometimes I really hate myself and just want it all to end. Most of the time it's other people's hatred towards me that rules. Why do people have this massive vendetta against me? Is it because I'm fat? I know I'm that. Is it because I'm a geek? I know I'm that too. Is it because I'm queer? Everyone knows I'm that, but I don't get why its the cause of all the attacks aimed at me. How is it hurting them? The only person it's hurting is me. Either way, hatred takes centre stage in my pitiful existence.

Hi there! I am retro_romance, a newbie on this fine network. I hope you enjoy my journal, which will become full of stories, poetry and anti-homophobic rants. I hope y'all will like it!
 Thank you and loads of love to the world, 
     RR xxx
